thread.title: Customer from Westerly, RI
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer from Westerly, RI

author: Customer from Westerly, RI
title: Customer from Westerly, RI
text: On by way to work, I ran over an old stick that punctured my 9 month old tire. Not living near Middletown, RI I had to ask for referrals. Boy was everyone right, Town Fair Tire on West Main Road is the best!!!
